ygData.subject: Help!  I've fallen and I can't get up.  Oh wait no one cares.

OOC: That's right.  It's time for the character that everyone loves to 
ignore.  Let's hear it for WHISTLER!  (I need more sleep.)

::Whistler::
       He had been standing alone for a long time.  "Argh!  She forgot me 
again."  He had heard a message about the attack so he headed to the edge of 
the city.

--part1_5b.1bc07ff5.28d57a2d_boundary
